document_data.name: ''Gauntlets of polishing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gauntlets of polishing''''' were [[gauntlets]] highly prized among metal smiths for their cleaning [[enchantment]]. They were considered to be an invaluable asset for the task of cleaning and drying metal [[armor]] before it could rust.
document_data.Powers: Any individual wearing these gauntlets was capable of cleaning and polishing anything made of metal very thoroughly, in one-tenth of the time that it would normally take to accomplish.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s in [[Ravens Bluff]] were gifted a pair of ''gauntlets of polishing'' alongside many other magical items by [[Harold Pierre]] after they brought the lost ship ''[[Windfinder]]'' back to port.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/A Shipwreck for Kassy|13-14}}
